newsitem.title: USA: Union Area School District, Pa., adjusted TIC.
newsitem.headline: Union Area School District, Pa., adjusted TIC.

text.p: The Union Area School District, Pa., said Monday it recalculated Boenning & Scattergood, Inc's winning bid on the District's $6.560 million general obligation bond issue.
The District said the true interest cost was 5.3955 percent reflecting the cost of bond insurance, not the 5.35 percent originally calculated.
